EmailTemplate.name: Product-Nurture40.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You V-Much {{lead.First Name:default=for Trying VMTurbo}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=We Just Wanted to}} Thank You. Thanks for giving us a shot. Your trial has come and gone, but we'd like to invite you to download our free and unlimited VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor <http://bit.ly/1ck6OMP>.
VHM won't continually drive your environment to health like Operations Manager, but it will let you know when things go awry - and we won't charge you a cent for it.
Get Free VHM <http://bit.ly/1ck6OMP>
If you'd like to revisit licensing VMTurbo Operations Manager, we are always here <mailto: sales@vmturbo.com>.
In good health, VMTurbo (877) 978 8818
